refnamediv.refpurpose: registers and remove nodes, disk, partition

refentry.refsect1:
DESCRIPTION
kanodes registers nodes and their disk and partition features for them to be available to the deployment system. It is used at the very beginning to describe a whole cluster (after having completed the installation for instance) or later when new nodes are added to a cluster already managed by the deployment system.
It use all the sub directory of /etc/kadeploy/nodes/

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: --add add a node to the database
--del Delete a specified node from the databases
--listpartition List the registred partition of a node ( -m is mandatory)

refsect1.title: configuration
refsect1.para: /etc/kadeploy/nodes/ is the root of the configuration file for each node of the deployment system.
/etc/kadeploy/nodes/node-1.mycluster.net/net file contain the network configuration of node-1.mycluster.net
/etc/kadeploy/nodes/node-1.mycluster.net/disk1 file contains the default partitioning schema of the node node-1.mycluster.net. see clusterpartition.conf man page.
